title: Ilhan Omar Disgraces Herself, And The US Congress (Ep 1522)
description:
Liberals are full of it. Especially AOC and Ilhan Omar. They say they believe in science as they continue to pump the country full of misinformation. In this episode, I discuss the latest controversy, as well as the crisis in Israel. 

News Picks:


The N.Y. Times story about Fusion GPS discussed in the show today.

This prominent US Senator is imploring the government to take the UFO threat seriously.

Massive numbers of people are leaving liberal New York, and moving to conservative Florida.

Can Biden do anything right?
